mapper.insert: insert into weibo_comment (id, user_id, content, pub_time, source, tweet_id) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{pubTime}, #{source}, #{tweetId})
mapper.select: select ifnull(exists(select 1 from weibo_comment where id = #{id}), 0);
mapper.update: update weibo_comment set user_id = #{userId}, content = #{content}, pub_time = #{pubTime}, source = #{source}, tweet_id = #{tweetId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) as `count`, source from weibo_comment where tweet_id = #{tweetId} group by source order by `count` desc limit 15
select count(*) as `count`, substr(pub_time, 6, 8) as t from weibo_comment where tweet_id = #{tweetId} group by t
select wu.* from weibo_comment wc left join weibo_user wu on wc.user_id = wu.id where wc.tweet_id = #{tweetId}
select place from weibo_user where id in ( select user_id from weibo_comment where tweet_id = #{tweetId}) and place != 'unknown' and place != '其他';
